patterns: How do i cancel a flight

responses: In order to cancel a flight, all passengers are required to send a mail to our official mail account to request for flight cancellation

patterns: How do i cancel a flight

responses: In order to request for a refund, all passengers are required to send a mail to our official mail account to request for refunds, attaching recipts and flight information
